text:
@johncardillo That's why people who have #preexistingconditions need to be extra careful with #COVID19
That's why everyone needs to #WearAMask
Your state is full of #COVID19 deaths, because of Trump's negligence.
You can't fight a pandemic with denial of #sciencematters and #DemonSperm
